subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Forward Petr Prucha scored the game-winner, a power-play goal with 5 minutes 14 seconds left, to put the Rangers in a tie for the last playoff spot in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: Forward Petr Prucha scored the game-winner, a power-play goal with 5 minutes 14 seconds left, to put the Rangers in a tie for the last playoff spot in the Eastern Conference.
